ENGLISH: Long and thin cylinder in the lower lip
PORTUGUESE: Cilindro longo e fino no lábio inferior
Talo da pena no septo nasal
Parte da perna abaixo do joelho e acima do tornozelo

ENGLISH: Horizontal battens that hold the paxiúbal batts of the wall together in the middle
GERMAN: Horizontallatten, die die Paxiúbalatten der Wand in der Mitte zusammenhalten

ENGLISH: Beams that sit on the paxiúbalatten on the wall and support the roof
GERMAN: Balken, die auf den Paxiúbalatten der Wand aufsitzen und das Dach tragen

ENGLISH: Roof cladding made from leaves of the caraná palm tree
GERMAN: Dachbekleidung aus Blättern der Caraná Palme
PORTUGUESE: Revestimento do telhado feito de folhas de caraná

ENGLISH: Horizontal barriers to which these caraná leaves are attached
GERMAN: Horizontalsperren, an denen diese Caraná Blätter befestigt sind
PORTUGUESE: Barreiras horizontais onde essas folhas de caraná são conectadas

ENGLISH: Storage place in forest (l. g .. mitasáua)
Scaffolding in the house to put things on or hang on
GERMAN: Gerüst im Haus, um Sachen darauf zu legen oder daran zu hängen
PORTUGUESE: Plataforma na casa para colocar ou pendurar coisas

ENGLISH: Men's carrying basket to get coca leaves
GERMAN: Tragbkorb der Männer um Coca-Blätter zu holen
PORTUGUESE: Cesto de carga para homens coletarem folhas de coca
Coador grande, plano e fino para mandioca
Coador grande, plano e rústico para mandioca

ENGLISH: Flat, coarse basket for storing fruits, bulbs, etc.
GERMAN: Flacher, grober Korb zum Aufbewahren von Füchten, Knollen usw.
PORTUGUESE: Cesto plano e rústico para armezenar frutas, bulbos etc.

ENGLISH: Deep basket for storing farinha (mandioca flour)
GERMAN: Tiefer Korb zum Aufbewahren von Farinha (Mandiocamehl)
PORTUGUESE: Cesto fundo para armazenar farinha (farinha de mandioca)

ENGLISH: Cylinder made of tree bark for storing manioc dough
GERMAN: Zylinder aus Baumrinde zum Aufbewahren von Mandiocamasse
PORTUGUESE: Cilindro feito de casca de árvore para armezenar massa de mandioca

ENGLISH: Small, round, very fine sieve to sieve coca powder.
GERMAN: Kleines, runder, sehr feines Sieb, um Cocapulver zu sieben.
PORTUGUESE: Peneira pequena, redonda e bem fina para pó de coca

ENGLISH: Braided tube (tipiti) for squeezing the manioc dough
GERMAN: Geflochtener Schlauch (tipiti) zum Auspressen der Mandiocamasse
PORTUGUESE: Tubo transado (tipiti) para espremer a massa da mandioca

ENGLISH: Square men's tucum cord bag for small items
GERMAN: Viereckige Tasche der Männer aus Tucumschnüren für Kleinkram
PORTUGUESE: Saco quadrado  masculino de cordão de tucum para itens pequenos

ENGLISH: Knitting frame z. manufacture these bags
Deep bowl in which you can ferment the mandioca
GERMAN: Tiefe Topfschale, in der man Mandiocamasse gären läßt
PORTUGUESE: Tigela funda para fermentar a mandioca

ENGLISH: Large, flatter saucepan for manicuéra (boiled mandioca juice)
GERMAN: Große, flachere Topfschale für Manicuéra (abgekochten Mandiocasaft)
PORTUGUESE: Panela grande mais plana para manicuera
Jarro de água com duas alças

ENGLISH: Clay bowl with foot as handle
Hourglass-shaped frame made of chopsticks for vessels
GERMAN: Sanduhrförmiges Gestell aus Stäbchen für Gefäße

PORTUGUESE: Ralador de mandioca, ralo de mandioca

ENGLISH: Wooden cylinder in which coca is tapped
GERMAN: Holzzylinder, in dem Coca geklopft wird
PORTUGUESE: Cilindro de madeira onde a coca é macerada

ENGLISH: Hollow bird bones for sucking coca
GERMAN: Hohler Vogelknochen, um Coca zu saugen
PORTUGUESE: Ossos ocos de ave para sugar coca

ENGLISH: Calabash with lid as a coca container
PORTUGUESE: Cabaça com tampa para ser um conteiner de coca
Tampa de madeira para essa cabaça

ENGLISH: Bone spoon used to take coca
GERMAN: Knochenlöffel, mit dem Coca genommen wird
PORTUGUESE: Colher de osso para pegar coca

ENGLISH: Grid on the boat for protection against backflow
GERMAN: Lattengitter im Boot Schutzgegen das Kielwasser
PORTUGUESE: Grade de rede no barco para proteção contra o refluxo

ENGLISH: Large poisoned arrows for high hunting
Case for the tips of these poison arrows
GERMAN: Futteral für die Spitzen dieser Giftpfeile
PORTUGUESE: Estojo para as pontas dessas flechas envenenadas

ENGLISH: Fish arrow with double iron point
PORTUGUESE: Flecha para peixe com ponta dupla de ferro

ENGLISH: Wooden stick into which the harpoon is inserted
GERMAN: Holzastab, in den die Harpune gestecket wird
PORTUGUESE: Graveto de madeira onde o arpão é inserido

ENGLISH: Pipe shaft of the harpoon arrow
Hand end of the tubular shaft
Tree silk (samaúma) to wrap the blowpipe sticks
Flutteral for the tips of the poison lances
GERMAN: Flutteral für die Spitzen der Giftlanzen

ENGLISH: Softer strips of raffia to tie belts and bracelets
GERMAN: Weichere Baststreifen, um Gürtel und Armbänder festzubinden

Ráfia enrolada em torno da trança

ENGLISH: Fine head feathers, gala jewelery (lingoa yamáhapoa geral: kangatára) mahápoali (macaw feathers)
GERMAN: Feine Kopffederbinde, Galaschmuck (lingoa yamáhapoa geral: kangatára) mahápoali (Ararafedern)

ENGLISH: Headdress made of toucan feathers in straw
PORTUGUESE: Cocar feito com penas de tucano e palha

ENGLISH: Dance device that represents a fish trap and is worn on the braid
GERMAN: Tanzgerät, das eine Fischreuse darstellt und am Zopf getragen wird
PORTUGUESE: Dispositivo de dança que representa uma armadilha de peixe e é usado na trança

ENGLISH: Macaw tail feather that is worn on this dance device
GERMAN: Araraschwanzfeder, die an diesem Tanzgerät getragen wird
PORTUGUESE: Pena da cauda da arara que é usada nesse dispositivo de dança

ENGLISH: Long nose piercing made of smoothed palm wood
PORTUGUESE: Piercing de nariz longo feito de madeira de palmeira polida
Bracelete curvado de pele da fruta tucumá

ENGLISH: Knee band woven from curauá fibers
PORTUGUESE: Faixa para o joelho de fibra de tucumá
Cilindro de quartzo, jóia maculina para os peitos

ENGLISH: Black seeds that are always associated with this quartz jewelry
GERMAN: Shwarze Samen, die stets mit diesem Quarzschmuck verbunden sind
PORTUGUESE: Sementes pretas que são sempre associadas a esse cilindro de quartzo

ENGLISH: Necklace made from gray grass seeds (sta.maria capim)
GERMAN: Halskette aus grauen Grassamen (Sta. Maria Capim)
PORTUGUESE: Colar feito de sementes de erva-de-santa-maria

ENGLISH: Raffia jacket of the mask suit
PORTUGUESE: Jaqueta de ráfia para o traje com máscaras

ENGLISH: Raffia hanging of the mask suit
PORTUGUESE: Fios de ráfia pendentes do traje
Cobertura para o resto feito de ráfia

ENGLISH: Wooden headpiece of the mask suit
White down feathers on those ears
The clatter of dance from halved fruit pods, which are worn around the ankle
GERMAN: Tanzklappern aus halbierten Fruchtschalen, die um den Fußköchel getragen werden

ENGLISH: Dance pole made of hollowed ambaúva wood
PORTUGUESE: Poste de dança feito de madeira oca de Ambaúva

ENGLISH: Incised pattern on the dance rattle
PORTUGUESE: Padrão entalhado no chocalho de dança

ENGLISH: Ordinary flute pipe made of pipe
Ash from ambaúva leaves as an additive to coca
GERMAN: Asche aus Ambaúvablättern als Zusatz zu Coca
PORTUGUESE: Cinzas das folhas de ambuava como um aditivo à coca

ENGLISH: Spherical, polished calabash for coca (only worn during festivities)
GERMAN: Kugelige, polierte Kalabasse für Coca (nur bei Festlichkeiten getragen)
PORTUGUESE: Cabaça esférica e polida para coca (apenas usadas nos festivais)

ENGLISH: Hollow heron bones to this device
PORTUGUESE: Ossos ocos de garça desse dispositivo

ENGLISH: Wax sticks made from inambú feathers that are dipped in beeswax and then bent together
GERMAN: Wachsstöcke aus Inambúfedern, die in Bienenwachs getaucht und dann zusammengebogen werden
PORTUGUESE: Paus de cera feitos de penas de inambu, as quais são mergulhadas em cera de abelha e coladas juntas

ENGLISH: Large snail shell that is used as a snuffbox
GERMAN: Große Schneckenschale, die als Schnupftabakdose verwendet wird
PORTUGUESE: Concha grande de lesma usada como um porta-tabaco

ENGLISH: Wound scratches (triangular calabash shard, studded with teeth of the trahíra fish)
GERMAN: Wundkratzer (dreieckige Kalabassenscherbe, mit Zähnchen d.Trahíra-Fisches besetzt)

PORTUGUESE: Mochiva (larva de besouro que fica na árvore)
Capsicum (gênero de plantas que inclui pimenta e pimentão)

ENGLISH: In the house, inside the house
GERMAN: In dem Haus, Im innern des Hauses

ENGLISH: We want to catch, let's catch!
GERMAN: Wir wollen fangen, laßt uns fangen!
PORTUGUESE: A gente quer pegar, bora pegar!

GERMAN: Ich schaukle mich in der Hängematte
Du schaukelst dich in der Hängematte

PORTUGUESE: Eu corto com a minha faca
